column4: oh man, I haven't thought of xcruise in forever .... in KDE there's a button in konq that lays everything out fairly well to show space

It always impresses me when people do something like switch totally over to a new OS....I only switched to Linux because windows wouldn't install for me, but it worked so well I stuck with it...though I probably wouldn't have if I had a choice at first :)
some people are curious by nature ;)
